summary: "Planet of the Apes" is a 1968 science fiction film about astronauts who crash-land on a future planet. They discover a society where intelligent apes rule over primitive humans. The movie, starring Charlton Heston, was based on a novel and went through many script rewrites. It cost $5.8 million to make and was a big hit, earning $33.3 million. The film's makeup artist, John Chambers, won an honorary Oscar for his work. The movie led to a popular franchise with sequels, a TV series, and remakes.
title: Planet of the Apes (1968 film)
